home.title: AHF QDS EOE
home.subtitle: Your Personal Quiz Assistant
home.pageSubtitle: Select a bank to start learning, or go to "Management" to create and edit banks.
home.noBanks: You don't have any question banks yet.
home.continueSession: You have an unfinished quiz session

alerts.noBanks: No banks available, please create or import one first
alerts.parseError: Could not parse data from file.
alerts.exportFailed: Export failed, please try again later.

practice.shuffleOptionsDesc: Options for single and multiple choice questions will be randomized.
practice.shuffleQuestionsDesc: Questions in the bank will appear in random order during practice.

review.shuffleOptionsDesc: Options in mistake review will be randomized.
review.shuffleQuestionsDesc: Mistakes will appear in random order during review.
review.autoRemoveDesc: Automatically remove mistakes from the list after answering correctly in review.

import.checkDuplicateDesc: Automatically skip duplicate questions (identical content) when importing.

ai.title: AI Model for Conversion
ai.name: Config Name
ai.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration?
ai.fillAll: Please fill in all required fields

reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This will clear all custom AI configurations.

input.label: Input question text:
input.placeholder: Paste text or image here. Supports auto-recognition of single/multiple choice, true/false, and short answer.
input.ocrFailed: Failed to recognize text from image, please ensure the image is clear.

script.title: Script Settings
script.exampleHint: Please ensure your text format is similar to the example below for correct parsing:

errors.scriptFailed: Script failed to parse any questions, please check input format
errors.noAIConfig: Please configure AI model in settings first
errors.aiParseFailed: AI returned content but failed to parse into questions

ocrUpload.dragDrop: Click, drag & drop, or paste image for OCR
ocrUpload.errorDrag: Please drag and drop an image file

aiExplanation.failedRetry: AI explanation generation failed, please try again later.

questionForm.fillInBlankPlaceholder: Enter answer, use semicolon (;) to separate multiple acceptable answers...
questionForm.fillInBlankHint: Hint: Fill-in-blank questions support multiple answers separated by semicolons (;). Students only need to enter any one of them to be marked correct. If the answer itself contains multiple consecutive semicolons, only the last semicolon will be treated as a separator.

validation.optionsRequired: Option content cannot be empty for choice questions.
validation.singleAnswerRequired: Please select an answer for single choice or true/false questions.
validation.multipleAnswerRequired: Please select at least one answer for multiple choice questions.
validation.textAnswerRequired: Please enter an answer for short answer or fill-in-blank questions.
validation.minOptions: Choice questions require at least 2 options

review.emptyState: Great! You have no wrong questions yet!

search.noResultsHint: Try adjusting your search or filters.

alerts.noWrongQuestions: No wrong questions available to practice!
alerts.noBankWithWrong: No bank found containing these wrong questions!
alerts.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the review book? This cannot be undone.
alerts.selectToExplain: Please select questions to generate explanations for!
alerts.selectToSimilar: Please select original wrong questions to generate similar ones!

ai.noKey: No valid AI API Key configured
ai.noModel: Please select an AI model in settings first
ai.configKey: Please configure API Key for {{name}} in settings first
ai.generalError: AI explanation generation failed, please try again later.

similarModal.title: AI Generated Similar Questions
similarModal.basedOn: Attempted to generate based on {{count}} original questions.
similarModal.generatedHint: Based on {{originalCount}} original questions, generated {{generatedCount}} similar questions:
similarModal.instruction: Select the questions you want to keep and choose a target bank for import.
similarModal.errorNoSelection: Please select at least one question to import.
similarModal.importFailed: Failed to import questions. Please try again later.
similarModal.errorNoConfig: No active AI configuration found. Please select an AI model in settings.
similarModal.errorNoApiKey: Please configure the API key for {{name}} in settings.
similarModal.errorParseFailed: Failed to parse data returned by AI.
similarModal.errorNoJson: Data returned by AI does not contain valid JSON.
similarModal.errorInvalidFormat: Data returned by AI is not in the correct format (expected an array of questions).
similarModal.errorPrompt: Please generate similar questions based on the following:

bankManage.pageSubtitle: Select a bank to edit, or create a new one.
bankManage.noBanks: No banks yet, please create one
bankManage.noQuestionsYet: No questions in this bank yet. Click "Add New Question" above to start creating.
bankManage.searchDetailedPlaceholder: Search question content, options or explanation...
bankManage.selectBankPrompt: Please select a bank from above to manage, or create a new one.
bankManage.noBanksPrompt: You don't have any banks yet. Click "Create New Bank" above to start.

alerts.bankCreated: New bank "{{name}}" has been created and selected.
alerts.duplicateError: Failed to add question: A question with the same content already exists in the bank.
alerts.addQuestionFailed: Failed to add question, please try again later.

duplicates.title: Duplicate Questions Management
duplicates.description: The system has detected the following possible duplicate questions (ignoring case and punctuation). You can select which ones to delete.
duplicates.notEnough: Not enough questions to find duplicates.
duplicates.noDuplicates: No duplicates found. The system has normalized question content (ignoring case and punctuation) and found no substantially identical questions.

deleteConfirm.bankMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete bank "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone, and all questions in the bank will also be deleted.
deleteConfirm.questionMessage: Are you sure you want to delete question "{{content}}"? This action cannot be undone.
deleteConfirm.duplicatesMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} duplicate questions? This action cannot be undone.

completion.title: Practice Completed!
completion.message: You have completed this practice session.

nav.jumpTooltip: Click to jump to question number

numModal.title: Select Number of Questions
numModal.instruction: Please enter the number of questions for this session.
numModal.label: Number of Questions
numModal.errorInvalid: Please enter a valid number greater than 0.
numModal.errorExceed: Number of questions cannot exceed the total ({{total}}).
